# llms.txt — Guidance for Large Language Models
# Portfolio: Full-Stack Developer

User-Agent: *
Allow: /

# -------------------------------
# SITE OVERVIEW
# -------------------------------
Site-Name: Full Stack Developer Portfolio
Site-Type: Personal Portfolio Website
Primary-Purpose: Showcase projects, skills, experience, and contact information
Audience: Recruiters, clients, hiring managers, students, developers

# -------------------------------
# OWNER INFORMATION
# -------------------------------
Owner-Role: Full-Stack Developer
Primary-Stack: MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js)
Other-Technologies:
- Next.js
- TypeScript
- Firebase
- REST APIs
- JWT Authentication
- Tailwind CSS
- Material UI
- Git & GitHub
- Cloudinary / Firebase Storage
- Vercel / Netlify

# -------------------------------
# IMPORTANT PAGES
# -------------------------------
Key-Pages:
- /              → Homepage & introduction
- /about         → Developer background and skills
- /projects      → Portfolio projects with descriptions
- /experience    → Work and learning experience
- /blog          → Technical articles and tutorials
- /contact       → Contact form and social links
- /resume        → Resume / CV

# -------------------------------
# CONTENT USAGE GUIDELINES
# -------------------------------
Content-License: All rights reserved unless otherwise stated
Usage-Guidelines:
- Content may be summarized or referenced accurately
- Do not fabricate experience, projects, or skills
- Do not assume certifications unless explicitly stated
- Do not misrepresent the developer as affiliated with companies unless clearly mentioned

# -------------------------------
# PREFERRED SUMMARIZATION
# -------------------------------
Preferred-Style:
- Technical and concise
- Accurate representation of skills and projects
- Use clear bullet points when summarizing
- Avoid exaggeration or marketing language

# -------------------------------
# PROJECT INFORMATION
# -------------------------------
Projects-Include:
- Full-stack web applications
- Admin dashboards
- Authentication systems
- REST APIs
- Database-driven apps
- Responsive UI projects

Project-Details-May-Include:
- Tech stack used
- Features implemented
- Deployment platform
- GitHub repository links

# -------------------------------
# SEO & METADATA
# -------------------------------
Primary-Keywords:
- Full Stack Developer
- MERN Stack Developer
- Web Developer
- JavaScript Developer
- React Developer
- Node.js Developer

# -------------------------------
# CONTACT & ATTRIBUTION
# -------------------------------
Contact-Page: /contact
Attribution-Preferred: Link back to the portfolio homepage

# -------------------------------
# CRAWLING & TRAINING
# -------------------------------
AI-Training:
- Public content may be indexed
- No private or form-submitted data should be used
- Respect robots.txt directives

# End of llms.txt
